backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Aggregates feature evidence linking features to affected frontend files and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise summaries of many frontend files including components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with metadata, branding, and a styled boot fallback loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps Dashboard with theme, Web3 provider, error boundary, and notification toaster.
frontend/src/components/BalanceView.tsx: Displays vault BNB/token balances with valuation, watched-token management, refresh, and live-update controls.
frontend/src/components/ContractInfo.tsx: Shows vault contract address, owner address, and BSC network info with copy and BscScan links.
frontend/src/components/DepositForm.tsx: Deposit form allowing token selection, amount input, validation, and transaction submission with history logging and balance display.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches render errors and displays a fallback UI with reload and optional technical details.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing attribution, build version, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with app branding and a theme toggle button.
frontend/src/components/TokenSelectorInp: Reusable token selector supporting dropdown of saved tokens and manual address input with validation.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Component displaying stored transaction history with statuses, links, and a clear-history option.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnect.ts: Wallet connection UI handling MetaMask availability, network checks, and mobile/desktop-specific instructions.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawForm.tsx: React component handling BNB and token withdrawals with validation, transaction submission, and history logging.
frontend/src/global.d.ts: Extends Window to type the ethereum provider interface for MetaMask-like wallets.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query and invalidates dependent queries on change.
Computes USD and BNB valuations for BNB and token balances by fetching prices and formatting results.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating queries are handled via Web3 instead of backend.
Manages a persistent token catalog with labels in localStorage, providing lookup, modification, and dropdown option helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useTxHistory.ts: Stores transaction history in localStorage, polls for receipt updates, and exposes functions to add or clear entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultBalances.ts: Fetches and tracks BNB and ERC20 token balances for the vault with fallback, polling, and per‑token error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultInfo.ts: Loads and exposes the vault owner address with simple loading and error state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultOperations.ts: Provides deposit and withdrawal operations for BNB and tokens, including approvals and transaction handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useWatchedTokens.ts: Manages a persistent, validated list of watched token addresses using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3.tsx: Creates a Web3 context handling wallet connection, network switching, contract calls, and transactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind‑based global styles including color themes, dark mode, accessibility, and layout utilities.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Exports build metadata and helpers to retrieve the current build version, date, and identifier.
frontend/src/lib/contracts.ts: Provides helpers for encoding and decoding contract calls and defines vault‑related function signatures.
frontend/src/lib/evm.ts: Provides bigint-based helpers for validating Ethereum addresses and encoding/decoding uint256 and address values, plus unit parsing/formatting utilities.
frontend/src/lib/prices.ts: Fetches token and BNB prices from CoinGecko, maps known token addresses to IDs, and formats prices for display.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard UI, handling wallet connection state, network checks, vault balance access, and tabbed deposit/withdraw views with loading states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and content paths for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the project's overall state, goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature requirements.
